casebody.data:
STREATER
v.
John N. VAUGHAN. No. 185P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, John Snyder, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of February 2008 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
